lib/hope/function/function.h

00008 
00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/function/function_bridge.h"
00012 
00013 namespace hope {
00014     template <typename Signature>
00015     class function;
00016 
00017     template <typename R, typename... Args>
00018     class function<R(Args...)> {
00019     public:
00020         function(const function& other) = default;
00021         function(function& other)
00022             : function(static_cast<const function&>(other)) { }
00023 
00024         constexpr function(function&& other) noexcept
00025             : m_bridge(other.m_bridge) {
00026             other.m_bridge = nullptr;
00027         }
00028 
00029         template <typename F>
00030         explicit function(F&& f)
00031             : m_bridge(nullptr) {
00032             using functor_t = std::decay_t<F>;
00033             using bridge_t = detail::function_bridge_impl<functor_t, R, Args...>;
00034             m_bridge = new bridge_t(std::forward<F>(f));
00035         }
00036 
00037         function& operator= (const function& other) {
00038             function tmp(other);
00039             swap(*this, other);
00040             return *this;
00041         }
00042 
00043         function& operator= (function&& other) noexcept {
00044             delete m_bridge;
00045             m_bridge = other.m_bridge;
00046             other.m_bridge = nullptr;
00047             return *this;
00048         }
00049 
00050         template<typename F>
00051         function& operator=(F&& f) {
00052             function tmp(std::forward<F>(f));
00053             swap(*this, tmp);
00054             return *this;
00055         }
00056 
00057         ~function() {
00058             delete m_bridge;
00059         }
00060 
00061         friend void swap(function& f1, function& f2) noexcept {
00062             std::swap(f1.m_bridge, f2.m_bridge);
00063         }
00064 
00065         explicit operator bool() const {
00066             return m_bridge == nullptr;
00067         }
00068 
00069         R operator()(Args... args) const {
00070             return m_bridge->invoke(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
00071         }
00072 
00073     private:
00074         detail::function_bridge<R, Args...>* m_bridge{ nullptr };
00075     };
00076 }
